On 10/4/06, Joakim Ohlrogge <joakim.ohlrogge@...> wrote:

> To me it seems that there are bigger problems than not using TDD to be
> solved in such organisations... darn...

That's the root cause of all our testing problems. After all testing
is a fairly well understood activity, so the problems come from the
environment in which testing is not rewarded.
